content: next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 72 single_crochet copyright © 2005 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the for further information page 1 of 1 for nb/sm chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 10 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 78 single_crochet repeat round 2 until the soaker sack measures 6 ½ 8 ½ - or to desired length - from the beginning decrease rounds for preemie round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 66 sts round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 60 sts round 4 repeat round 2 for nb/small round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 10 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 72 sts round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in each single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining and in next 9 single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 66 sts round 4 repeat round 2 bottom ribbing switching to g hook chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet now and throughout round 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet and each single_crochet around join with slip_stitch in third chain of chain 3 round 2 chain 3 fpdc in next double_crochet bpdc in next double_crochet repeat around join with slip_stitch in top of chain 3 finish off round 3 repeat round 2 until 8 ½ 10 ½ from beginning finish off waistband with g hook and rs facing join with slip_stitch in any of the free loops of beg chain chain 3 round 1 double_crochet in each free loop around join with slip_stitch in third chain of chain 3 round 2 chain 3 fpdc in next double_crochet bpdc in next double_crochet repeat around join with slip_stitch in top of chain 3 finish off round 3 repeat round 2 until ribbing is 1 ½ long finish off drawstring optional with g hook chain 75 90 or
